remarks:
A wff may be quantified with a variable not free in it.  Theorem 19.3 of [Margaris] p. 89.  See ~ 19.3v for a version requiring fewer axioms. (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.)
